verses.verse: O give thanks <WH3034> unto the Lord <WH3068>; for he is good <WH2896>: because his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
Let Israel <WH3478> now say <WH559>, that his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
Let the house <WH1004> of Aaron <WH175> now say <WH559>, that his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
Let them now that fear <WH3373> the Lord <WH3068> say <WH559>, that his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
I called <WH7121> upon the Lord <WH3050> in distress <WH4712>: the Lord <WH3050> answered <WH6030> me <WH4800>, and set me in a large place.
The Lord <WH3068> is on my side <WH3372>; I will not fear: what can <WH6213> man <WH120> do unto me <WH6213>?
The Lord <WH3068> takes my part with them that help <WH5826> me <WH7200>: therefore shall I see my desire upon them that hate me <WH8130>.
It is better <WH2896> to trust <WH2620> in the Lord <WH3068> than to put confidence <WH982> in man <WH120>.
It is better <WH2896> to trust <WH2620> in the Lord <WH3068> than to put confidence <WH982> in princes <WH5081>.
All nations <WH1471> surrounded me about <WH5437>: but in the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068> will I destroy them <WH4135>.
They surrounded me about <WH5437>; Yes <WH5437>, they surrounded me about: but in the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068> I will destroy them <WH4135>.
They surrounded me about <WH5437> like bees <WH1682>; they are quenched <WH1846> as the fire <WH784> of thorns <WH6975>: for in the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068> I will destroy them <WH4135>.
You have thrust <WH1760> severely <WH1760> at me that I might fall <WH5307>: but the Lord <WH3068> helped me <WH5826>.
The Lord <WH3050> is my strength <WH5797> and song <WH2176>, and is become my salvation <WH3444>.
The voice <WH6963> of rejoicing <WH7440> and salvation <WH3444> is in the tabernacles <WH168> of the righteous <WH6662>: the right hand <WH3225> of the Lord <WH3068> does <WH6213> valiantly <WH2428>.
The right hand <WH3225> of the Lord <WH3068> is exalted <WH7426>: the right hand <WH3225> of the Lord <WH3068> does <WH6213> valiantly <WH2428>.
I shall not die <WH4191>, but live <WH2421>, and declare <WH5608> the works <WH4639> of the Lord <WH3050>.
The Lord <WH3050> has chastened <WH3256> me severely <WH3256>: but he has not given me over <WH5414> unto death <WH4194>.
Open <WH6605> to me the gates <WH8179> of righteousness <WH6664>: I will go <WH935> into them <WH3034>, and I will praise the Lord <WH3050>:
This gate <WH8179> of the Lord <WH3068>, into which the righteous <WH6662> shall enter <WH935>.
I will praise <WH3034> you <WH6030>: for you have heard me <WH3444>, and are become my salvation.
The stone <WH68> which the builders <WH1129> refused <WH3988> is become the head <WH7218> stone of the corner <WH6438>.
This is the Lord <WH3068>'s doing <WH6381>; it is marvelous in our eyes <WH5869>.
This is the day <WH3117> which the Lord <WH3068> has made <WH6213>; we will rejoice <WH1523> and be glad in it <WH8055>.
Save <WH3467> now <WH577>, I beg you <WH3068>, O Lord: O Lord <WH3068>, I beg <WH577> you <WH6743>, send now prosperity.
Blessed <WH1288> be he that comes <WH935> in the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068>: we have blessed <WH1288> you out of the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068>.
God <WH410> is the Lord <WH3068>, which has showed us light <WH215>: bind <WH631> the sacrifice <WH2282> with cords <WH5688>, even unto the horns <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196>.
You are my God <WH410>, and I will praise <WH3034> you <WH430>: you are my God, I will exalt you <WH7311>.
O give thanks <WH3034> unto the Lord <WH3068>; for he is good <WH2896>: for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever <WH5769>.
